featured.text: Kareem had to fetch the water from a source that was a kilometer away.
Then, Dognition guides you through tests that are as fun as playing fetch or hide-and-seek.
Children in this region often start running at an early age, covering great distances to fetch water and firewood or to reach the nearest school.

definition.en_def: To go and bring back something.
definition.example: I will fetch some water from the kitchen.
